content: these sweet cuddly critters are knit in the round intermediate level using magic loop or double pointed needles the bear bunny and puppy freely sit at approx 7 without ears and the legs body arms and head are all knit on as you work along the 3 different styles of jackets are removable and interchangeable they are created using #3-light wt dk wt yarn and size 3 3 25mm 32 circular knitting needles if using magic loop each animal 150 yds each king cole dollymix dk-taupe red heart babyhugs light-dolphin premier everyday dk-almond jackets 60 yds each king cole dollymix dk-candy red heart babyhugs light-sprout & bluie size 3 3 25mm 32 circular knitting needles if using magic loop or double pointed needles 10mm safety eyes or embroidery thread/yarn embroidery thread/yarn for nose 3/8 button for each large-eyed blunt needle & long straight pins removable stitch markers ring markers polyester fiberfill stuffing
